about_the_game:
Experience the thrill of fishing in the Eastern United States

Real VR Fishing is back with its fourth DLC, the US East Coast DLC! This expansion takes you to some of the most iconic fishing destinations in the eastern United States, from the calm waters of Liberty Island to the bustling waters of the Brooklyn Bridge.

In addition to the new locations, the US East Coast DLC also features over 41 new fish species, including the Hammerhead Shark!

Also, there are 15 unique fish per stage! These fish have special movement and BGM, and are bosses that only appear after you catch all the fish on each map!

Fish your way in the US East Coast like a professional angler!

15 FISHING LOCATIONS ACROSS THE US EAST

Go on a fishing trip to 15 new fishing locations in the US East Coast, one of the best places for anglers!

Over 41 FISH SPECIES ADDED (Normal to Epic)

New fish are added to the US EAST COAST DLC. Catch over 41 new fish in the US East, including the Hammerhead Shark!

15 UNIQUE FISH PER STAGE

Unique Fish appear at each stage in the US East Coast. A Unique Fish will appear with a low chance if a player owns all the fish on the stage. It has a unique movement and background music. Catch them and make your Fish Dex richer!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or greater / AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 / AMD R9 390X
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
  • Additional Notes: Oculus Rift, Oculus Rift S, HTC Vive and HTC Vive Pro

short_description: Experience the thrill of fishing in the Eastern United States Real VR Fishing is back with its 4th DLC, the US East Coast DLC! This DLC takes you to some of the most iconic fishing destinations in the eastern United States, from the calm waters of Liberty Island to the bustling waters.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America
